product_name: Garneau Neo Power Bib Bike Shorts - Men's
long_description: Featuring high-tech Lycra(R) Power fabric, Garneau Neo Power bib bike shorts sport more compression than basic knits for improved circulation. Contrast stitching and accents provide a racer look. Lycra Power fabric boasts comfortable stretch; high performance compression promotes blood circulation and active muscle recovery on long rides. Fabric has a UPF 50+ rating, offering excellent protection from harmful ultraviolet rays. 12-panel construction provides flexibility and support for hard-working muscles. Flatlock seams help prevent uncomfortable chafing. Airzone chamois keeps air circulating and offers memory foam padding for long stretches in the saddle. 1 back pocket holds a phone and a few snacks. Powerband compression in the Garneau Neo Power bib bike shorts promotes active muscle recovery.
short_description: Featuring high-tech Lycra(R) Power fabric, Garneau Neo Power bib bike shorts sport more compression than basic knits for improved circulation. Contrast stitching and accents provide a racer look.
